events.title: WRCCDC Qualifier 2025
events.description: Online qualifier round for the Western Regional CCDC. Top 8 teams advance to the regional competition.

events.title: PRCCDC Qualifier 2025
events.description: Qualifier round for the Pacific Rim CCDC covering Alaska, Hawaii, and Pacific territories.

events.title: PRCCDC Regional 2025
events.description: Three-day regional championship for the Pacific Rim region. Winner advances to nationals.

events.title: WRCCDC Regional 2025
events.description: Three-day regional championship at Coastline Community College. Winner advances to nationals.

events.title: Volunteer Training: Red Team Basics
events.description: Training session for new red team volunteers. Learn the fundamentals of ethical hacking and competition rules.

events.title: Student Workshop: Network Defense Fundamentals
events.description: Free workshop for students covering network security basics and CCDC preparation.

events.title: HackerCamp 2025
events.description: Month-long intensive summer cybersecurity training program for students.
